t: r/Iceland on Reddit: What is Amazon like in Iceland?
Which amazon version is used in Iceland? - Iceland Forum - Tripadvisor
s: The most common restriction is that Amazon usually only ship within their country or specific region, so an Amazon gift card from any Amazon store can be rather useless when one can't have the product shipped to oneself. No Amazon site has Iceland as a part of their service region by default.
